name: Hoppy Days (JurassicKangaru)
description:
this was a game that i made while i was watching a Godot Udemy course:

https://www.udemy.com/course/godot/

I highly recommend the course, it's full of great games to make and its really easy to follow along with.

I will also begin doing some devlog stuff for a game I want to make on my youtube channel and here on Itch so check that out if you want:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCc45Mg3UjATUriagYs8E3pg

NOTE:

the Quit Game button does nothing, this is left over from the Windows/MacOS builds
